sitename: 2-1-1 Texas | 2-1-1 Texas - Connecting People And Services
cleaned_text: Find Help A search term is required to find resources for food, health, housing, and more Not seeing what you are looking for? Try our [Guided Search](#guided) or search [here](/advanced-search/) by agency name. Needs: This column refers to what you're looking for, like Rent Payment Assistance or Food Pantries. It can also describe groups of people services are for, like Older Adults or, if you're looking for health-related help, a "need" can be the specific illness, like Heart Disease. Programs: The names of the programs that various organizations offer. You can also the name of the organization if you don't know the program Guided Search Housing/Shelter Employment Food/Nutrition Veterans Crisis/Emergency [Coronavirus Services for Disabilities](https://www.211texas.org/guided_search/?ds=%7B%22service%5C%5Cservice_taxonomy%5C%5Cmodule_servicepost%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%5B%7B%22taxonomy_id%22%3A4198%7D%5D%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22contains_array%22%5D%7D%2C%22agency%5C%5Cagency_system%5C%5Cname%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%22VLTEST%22%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22notequals%22%5D%7D%7D) [In Home Attendants for People With Disabilities](https://www.211texas.org/guided_search/?ds=%7B%22service%5C%5Cservice_taxonomy%5C%5Cmodule_servicepost%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%5B%7B%22taxonomy_id%22%3A4017%7D%5D%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22contains_array%22%5D%7D%2C%22agency%5C%5Cagency_system%5C%5Cname%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%22VLTEST%22%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22notequals%22%5D%7D%7D) [Early Intervention for Children With Disabilities/Delays](https://www.211texas.org/guided_search/?ds=%7B%22service%5C%5Cservice_taxonomy%5C%5Cmodule_servicepost%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%5B%7B%22taxonomy_id%22%3A3243%7D%5D%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22contains_array%22%5D%7D%2C%22agency%5C%5Cagency_system%5C%5Cname%22%3A%7B%22value%22%3A%22VLTEST%22%2C%22operator%22%3A%5B%22notequals%22%5D%7D%7D) [Children with Special Health Care Needs Program](https://www.hhs.texas.gov/services/disability/children-special-health-care-needs-program)(Helps children, under age 21, with special health care needs that include physical symptoms, and individuals of any age with cystic fibrosis.) [Click here to try a word search](#search) or [Click here](https://www.211texas.org/advanced-search/) to try a broader search. Advanced Search Health Related Resources in Texas [Texas Medicaid & Healthcare Partnership](http://www.tmhp.com/Pages/default.aspx)website. If you are in Medicaid Managed Care, you can find providers on your health plan's website, or call your health plan for assistance. If you have private insurance, you can contact your health plan for information and assistance. Many of the services below are available to anyone, with or without insurance.
